title: Best Scotch broth
ingredients: ['1kg leg of lamb', '2 litres water', '3 onions, chopped', '3 turnips, chopped', '2 carrots, chopped', '1 tablespoon whole black peppercorns', '90g pearl barley', '1 carrot, diced', '2 onions, finely chopped', '1 leek, chopped', '1 stick celery, diced', '2 turnips, diced']
